  16. (* Implementation of the strace feature *)

  18. ‌let strace = Variables.make ("strace", "Whether to use strace")
  19. ‌let strace_flags =
  20.   Variables.make ("strace_flags", "Which flags to pass to strace")

  22. ‌let (counters : (string, int) Hashtbl.t) = Hashtbl.create 10

  24. ‌let get_logfile_name base =
  25.   let n = try Hashtbl.find counters base with Not_found -> 1 in
  26.   let filename = Printf.sprintf "strace-%s_%d.log" base n in
  27.   Hashtbl.replace counters base (n+1);
  28.   filename

  30. let _ =
  31.   Variables.register_variable strace;
  32.   Variables.register_variable strace_flags
